# Onsite Mobile Shredding Services Request for Proposal (RFP)
### Tender Announcement
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified vendors to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) process for onsite mobile shredding services. 

### Details
- **Contracting Entity**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
- **Address**: 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0R2
- **Procurement ID**: cb-5304-53185180
- **Anticipated Start Date**: Not specified
- **Anticipated End Date**: Not specified
- **Solicitation ID**: 202300803/D

### Requirements
- Secure on-site or mobile paper and material document destruction services for 36 months
- Documents include but not limited to correspondence, memoranda, books, plans, maps, drawings, diagrams, photographs, and other paper documents
- Security requirements exist
- Contractors must be escorted at all times within RCMP space

### Evaluation Criteria
- Lowest Price

### Submission Requirements
- Tenders must be submitted in either official language of Canada
- The tender must include a signed statement that the Bidder is a participant in the federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD)
- More information regarding submission instructions and requirements is available in the attached tender documents.

### Notification and Postage of Documents
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
- Procuring Office: Adam Harrington, Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), 73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa, ON.

### Trade Agreements and Country of Origin
- The RCMP may apply the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other trade agreements.

### Bid Notification
- Bid notifications will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS).

### Relevant Attachments
- The tender documents are available at the following locations:
  * https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5304/202300803d---rfp-fr.pdf
  * https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5304/202300803d---rfp-en.pdf
